data-protection.title: Data Privacy

explanation.label: Explain
explanation.deepl:
## Text optimization

To make your question as readable and understandable as possible, we have it translated into English and back into German using the translation program [DeepL] (https://www.deepl.com/translator). 

The back translation is in almost all cases better than the original in terms of spelling, grammar, punctuation and language style.
explanation.spacy:
## Text analysis

Using NLP (Natural Language Processing) your question will be analyzed grammatically. The recognized nouns are put into their basic form, i.e. lemmatized, and suggested to you as keywords. For the text analysis we use the free NLP software [spaCy] (https://spacy.io/). 

The keywords can be used to filter the list of questions or to create a word cloud.
explanation.topic-cloud:
## Topics as tags in a word cloud

The **topic cloud** visualizes the distribution of the keywords. 

 The calculation of the font size includes:

* the difference between up- and down-votes, if it is positive
* the number of questions with this keyword
* the number of questioners with this keyword.
* the role of the questioner: room creator, moderator or participant 
* whether the questioner has selected a question category
* whether the keyword was generated or assigned by the question poser
* whether the question was answered by the room creator or a moderator 

 The topic cloud serves as a **navigator** to all questions related to a selected keyword: If you click on a word in the cloud, you will get to the questions related to this keyword. 

The room creator can customize the appearance of the topic cloud in the options according to his wishes. He can also experiment with the keyword generation parameters to optimize the **semantic selectivity**.
explanation.user-bonus:
The teacher can mark »good« questions for a bonus. Your questions from all courses (rooms) that have received a star will be listed here.

Depending on the agreement, you can email the token of the star to the teacher to redeem it for a bonus.
explanation.bonus-archive:
All questions that you have marked with a star in your rooms are listed here. You can use the list to check whether the token that a participant sent you by mail is valid. 

To find a token quickly, there is a search field. If the token is valid, you can display the corresponding question directly via a link.

home-page.accessibility-join-button: Enter the session with the specified session key.
home-page.accessibility-join-input: Here you can enter the  key of the session you want to join. The presenter will tell you the session key.
home-page.live-announcer: Welcome to fragpunktjetzt. This site has been designed to support screen readers like ChromeVox, Voiceover and many others. Our Audioguide feature can assist you in navigating the site. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.

content.tag-cloud-info: The word cloud in »frag.jetzt« serves as a semantic filter: the larger the font, the more often the word was used grammatically in the questions or assigned as a keyword. The ratings of the questions also influence the font size.
content.tag-cloud-questions-title: Which questions should the topic cloud include?
content.tag-cloud-questions-brainstorming: Brainstorming: New questions from now on

joyride.cantAccessRoute: This route is not available. The tour will be cancelled.
joyride.greeting: We guide you to the most important places in our audience response system »frag.jetzt«. The tour will only take a few minutes.
joyride.loginButtonHeader: No, unless you want to store your visited or self-created rooms on our server. An account is also advisable for managing bonus points.
joyride.roomJoin: Enter the access code for the room where the event you want to attend is taking place.
joyride.createRoom: Anyone can create a room for an event. The access code is either generated or you determine it yourself. Bear in mind that without registration, the room and all its data will only exist in this browser.
joyride.introduction: If you want to create your own rooms, then find out about the didactic concept and the usage scenarios of »frag.jetzt«.
joyride.feedbackLink: You found a bug? You would like to have another feature? The link leads you to the feedback room. The tour will continue in this room.
joyride.optionHeader: This is the main menu of »frag.jetzt«. In addition to the options of the current page, you will also find general functions here such as the room list.
